scripts.build: tsc && vite build && rm -rf out && mv dist out && nomo-webon-cli build out
scripts.deploy: nomo-webon-cli bumpVersion public/nomo_manifest.json && npm run build && nomo-webon-cli deploy nomo.tar.gz production1 && nomo-webon-cli deploy nomo.tar.gz production2 && ./scripts/clear_cloudflare_cache.sh
